net.sf.jgcs

Interface GroupConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface GroupConfiguration
extends Serializable
    A process group identifier. It is used mostly to open data and control sessions associated with that group on some protocol. Its content is entirely specified by each protocol.
